name: Build on Blockchain with Ease - with Austin Griffith
location: Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Czech Technical University in Prague, Technická 2, Praha 6 - Dejvice
description: See What It's Like to Build on the Blockchain – Live with Austin Griffith! Curious how blockchain apps are actually built? Join us for a special hands-on session with Austin Griffith – leading Web3 developer, founder of the Buidl Guidl community, creator of Scaffold-ETH. Austin will guide you through a live comparison of building in the world of Web2 vs Web3, showing the real-life impact of decentralization for developers.
short_description: A hands-on session with Austin Griffith on building blockchain apps, Web2 vs Web3, and AI-assisted prototyping.
